alert.note: Alert for Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 7:40PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect west central Cuyahoga...central Medina and eastern Lorain Counties Until 915 PM EST.... At 738 PM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band extended North Ridgeville southward across western Medina County, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Locations that may be impacted include... Lorain, Elyria, Medina, Westlake, North Ridgeville, Avon Lake, Grafton, Lodi, Chippewa Lake, North Olmsted, Avon, Bay Village, Sheffield Lake, Olmsted Falls, Eaton, Sheffield, Lagrange, Westfield Center, Spencer and Gloria Glens Park. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. &&
